- Location: Column 15
- Date: Domitian

<div class="col2">

^29^ *ỉȝw zp-snw  *  
*nṯr pn šps  *  
*ỉw=f pw m ḥtp zp-snw  *  
   
*swr=f šfy.t   *  
*n zȝ=f mry(=f)  *  
*nsw.t-bỉty  *  
*(ỉwtgrtr kysrs)|  *  
*zȝ-Rʿ  *  
*(tmdyns nty-ḫwỉ)|  *  
  
^29^ Praise, praise!  
This august god,  
he has come in peace!  
  
May he magnify the respect  
for his beloved son,  
King of Upper and Lower Egypt  
(Autokrator Caesar)|  
Son of Re  
(Domitian Augustus)|!  

</div>
